name: part_001
file: tmp_【重大告知あり！！】FBKINGDOM Fest. #機密解禁フブキングダム【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [ES9vrNjxiIQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs 'Say! Fanfare!' on stage.

subtitles.original: いつも 輝き続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's always keep on shining

subtitles.original: 共に繋ぐ アンコール
subtitles.english: An encore we connect together

subtitles.original: 何もかもが新しくて 右も左も分からない
subtitles.english: Everything is so new, and I don't know my left from right

subtitles.original: 時も頑張れたのは 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: But the reason I could keep trying was because I wasn't alone

subtitles.original: 一つ一つ お願いが 後押しになって一歩ずつでも
subtitles.english: Each and every wish became a support, and even if just step by step

subtitles.original: 私は自分らしく磨いていく フューチャー
subtitles.english: I'll keep polishing my future in my own way

subtitles.original: 理想もイメージもまだまだ 手探りしても
subtitles.english: Even if my ideals and images are still a work in progress

subtitles.original: 響き合ってほら 世界は今 彩って
subtitles.english: Look, they're resonating, and the world is now taking on color

subtitles.original: Say! さあ その顔上げて みんなで手を取れば
subtitles.english: Say! Now, lift up your face, and if we all take each other's hands

subtitles.original: Nice! これから夢の先へ 駆け出そう
subtitles.english: Nice! Let's run towards the future of our dreams together

subtitles.original: Say! ほら 押しも押されぬ 止まらない全力ですから
subtitles.english: Say! Look, we're unstoppable, moving forward with all our might

subtitles.original: 大好きな想いが 溢れそうなほど
subtitles.english: With feelings of love almost overflowing

subtitles.original: 共に繋ぐ ファンファーレ
subtitles.english: The fanfare we connect together

subtitles.original: Woah-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh...
subtitles.english: Woah-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh...

subtitles.original:
SUPERNOVA
作詞・作曲・編曲：小池竜暉
subtitles.english:
SUPERNOVA
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Ryuki Koike

subtitles.original: 甘く ほろ苦い夢
subtitles.english: A sweet, bittersweet dream

subtitles.original: これでいいか これがいいか 追いかけたあの日
subtitles.english: Is this okay? Is this what's best? Those days I spent chasing after it

subtitles.original: ここに 間違いはなくて 正解もなくて
subtitles.english: There's no mistake here, and there's no correct answer either

subtitles.original: 自分次第で 怖くて仕方ないけど
subtitles.english: It's all up to me, and I can't help being scared, but

subtitles.original: 誰かじゃない 君と見たい 景色は鮮明で
subtitles.english: It's not just anyone, the scenery I want to see with you is so vivid

subtitles.original: それじゃ ここで 足踏みなんか していられないじゃん
subtitles.english: Well then, I can't just be standing still here, can I?

subtitles.original: Oh yes! 無数の星の中
subtitles.english: Oh yes! Among the countless stars

subtitles.original: Oh yes! 光は君がくれた
subtitles.english: Oh yes! You were the one who gave me light

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! もっと 超えていけるさ
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! We can go even further

subtitles.original: Oh yes! SUPERNOVA 起きろ今
subtitles.english: Oh yes! SUPERNOVA, wake up now

subtitles.original: Oh yes! 何度だって飛べる
subtitles.english: Oh yes! I can fly as many times as it takes

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! これは紛れもなく僕らの奇跡 High Five!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! This is undoubtedly our miracle, High Five!

subtitles.original: Woah-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh...
subtitles.english: Woah-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh...

subtitles.original: これから 泣きじゃくる日でも
subtitles.english: Even on days when I'm crying my eyes out from now on

subtitles.original: いつだって ここにおいで 強がりはいらないよ
subtitles.english: Come here anytime, you don't need to put on a brave face

subtitles.original: 一人じゃない 君もほら 僕ら手を取り合って
subtitles.english: You're not alone, see? Let's take each other's hands

subtitles.original: 笑おう 叫ぼう あの空の向こうへ
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, let's shout, towards the other side of that sky

subtitles.original: Oh yes! 無数の星の中
subtitles.english: Oh yes! Among the countless stars

subtitles.original: Oh yes! 交わした約束も
subtitles.english: Oh yes! Even the promises we made

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! きっと 叶えられるさ
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! I'm sure we can make them come true

subtitles.original: Oh yes! SUPERNOVA 駆けろ今
subtitles.english: Oh yes! SUPERNOVA, run now

subtitles.original: Oh yes! 誰一人欠かせない
subtitles.english: Oh yes! Not a single person is expendable

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! あの日描いた夢の先まで High Five!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! To the future of the dreams we drew that day, High Five!

subtitles.original: この今を 愛せるように
subtitles.english: So that I can love this 'now'

subtitles.original: 君に向けて歌うよ 心が叫んで
subtitles.english: I'll sing to you, my heart is shouting

subtitles.original: Oh yes! 無数の星の中
subtitles.english: Oh yes! Among the countless stars

subtitles.original: Oh yes! 光は君がくれた
subtitles.english: Oh yes! You were the one who gave me light

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! もっと 超えていけるさ
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! We can go even further

subtitles.original: Oh yes! SUPERNOVA 起きろ今
subtitles.english: Oh yes! SUPERNOVA, wake up now

subtitles.original: Oh yes! 何度だって飛べる
subtitles.english: Oh yes! I can fly as many times as it takes

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! これは紛れもなく僕らの奇跡
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! This is undoubtedly our miracle

subtitles.original: いつまでも ありのまま 君が君らしくあれるように
subtitles.english: Always, just as you are, so that you can be yourself

subtitles.original: もっと ずっと 届けよう 不思議と怖くはないんだ 綺麗な空 どこまでも
subtitles.english: I'll keep reaching out, more and more, strangely I'm not afraid, to the beautiful sky, everywhere
